name: Loop City (Fupi)
description:
Oh no, you fell down a bottomless pit!

Thankfully, there's a prosperous town of people living in this city! They will help you out of this endless hole if you give them a helping hand as well.

How to play
  • Move with the mouse.
  • Left click (or press X) to interact with objects.
  • Right click (or press Z) to throw away an item you don't want.
  • Press Space to open the shop.
  • After unlocking diving, scroll down (or press S) to fall faster.
  • After unlocking gliding, scroll up (or press W) to fall slower.
  • Press ESC or Enter to pause the game and review the controls.
Tips and tricks
  • I recommend you do the Lab's quests as soon as you can.
  • Remember to increase your steering by giving apples to the lab.
  • If you unlock gliding, you can get seeds at the shop and plant them in the farm without having to loop over.
Meta

This is my first time doing all the music and sounds by myself! Please rate them in the comments.

  • Game made with Godot.
  • Graphics made with Krita.
  • Music made with Bandlab.
  • Sounds made with Beepbox.
